X

xyscope - package xyscope
 
XYscope - Class in xyscope
Render vector graphics on a vector display (oscilloscope X-Y mode, laser) by converting them to audio .
XYscope(PApplet) - Constructor for class xyscope.XYscope
Initialize library in setup(), use default system audio out setting.
XYscope(PApplet, AudioOutput) - Constructor for class xyscope.XYscope
Initialize instance of XYscope and patch to an already existing signal.
XYscope(PApplet, String, int) - Constructor for class xyscope.XYscope
Initialize library in setup(), custom soundcard by string for XY and set custom sample rate (44100, 192000).
